attributes.action: CONSIDER THE FACT THAT NON RACIST PEOPLE MAY FEEL THAT IMMIGRANTS, ASYLUM SEEKERS, AND ETHNIC MINORITY GROUPS ARE GIVEN UNFAIR ADVANTAGE OVER UK CITIZENS. SPECIFICALY IN TERMS OF LOCAL AUTHORITY HOUSING, APPLICATION FOR BENIFITS AND  FUNDING FOR SERVICES SUCH AS TRANSLATORS, SOCIAL GROUPS, AND INTERGRATION MEASURES.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It would appear that the issue surrounding immigration and ethnic minorities is more relevant than ever, and the strain on local authorities is becoming clear. We would ask the prime minister to end the increasing politically correct attitude of the past decade and allow british citizens of all races to be allowed an open forum on this matter without being branded as racist. And to take notice of the growing frustration of the british public surrounding this topic and set out a clear policy on how such matters will be dealt with fairly and not put citizens of his country at a dissadvantage.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
